title: Mala Simple Syrup
source: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
categories: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
directions: 1. In a medium pot over high heat, bring the water to a boil.2. Add the sugar, stirring to dissolve.3. Lower the heat, add the Sichuan pepper and chilies, and simmer for about 10 minutes.4. Remove the pot from the heat and let the syrup cool.5. Strain the syrup through a fine-mesh sieve into a glass jar to remove the spices.6. You can use the syrup immediately or store the jar in the refrigerator for up to several weeks.
